section.name: Credit Cards Operations
section.description: Credit Cards functionality testing including card management, transaction processing, statement uploads, reconciliation features, and financial information tracking within the Reconciliation module

cases.title: Verify Credit Cards Page Loads Successfully
Test Credit Card Financial Information Display
Test Credit Card Transaction Filtering by Date
Test Credit Card Transaction Search Functionality
Verify Credit Card Statement Upload Area
Test Credit Card Statement File Upload Validation
Test Credit Card Reconciliation Status Display
Test Credit Card Transaction Action Buttons
Test Credit Cards Empty State Handling

full_cases.title: Verify Credit Cards Page Loads Successfully
full_cases.custom_preconds:
User is logged in to the application
User has access to Reconciliation section
User has appropriate permissions for Credit Cards
Credit Cards functionality is available
full_cases.custom_expected:
Credit Cards page loads successfully
All main elements are visible and functional
Page clearly indicates user is in Credit Cards section
Navigation is smooth and responsive
No critical errors occur during page load

full_cases.title: Verify Credit Card Transactions Display
full_cases.custom_preconds:
User is logged in and on Credit Cards page
Credit card data is available or empty state is expected
Transaction display functionality is enabled
full_cases.custom_expected:
Transaction list is displayed (even if empty)
Transaction data is properly formatted
Empty states are handled gracefully
Transaction count is accurate
Data structure is consistent and functional

full_cases.title: Test Credit Card Selection Functionality
full_cases.custom_preconds:
User is logged in and on Credit Cards page
Credit card accounts are available for selection
Card selection functionality is enabled
full_cases.custom_expected:
Credit card selector is present and functional
Card selection works correctly
Page data updates based on selected card
Card-specific information is displayed
Selection process is smooth and intuitive

full_cases.title: Test Credit Card Financial Information Display
full_cases.custom_preconds:
User is logged in and on Credit Cards page
Credit card is selected
Financial information is available for display
full_cases.custom_expected:
Account balance is displayed correctly
Credit limit information is visible
Available credit amount is shown
Minimum payment is displayed
Due date is visible
Financial information is accurate and well-formatted

full_cases.title: Test Credit Card Transaction Filtering by Date
full_cases.custom_preconds:
User is logged in and on Credit Cards page
Transaction data is available
Date filtering functionality is enabled
full_cases.custom_expected:
Date filter controls are present and functional
Date filtering works correctly
Filtered results are accurate
Date range selection is intuitive
Filter application is responsive

full_cases.title: Test Credit Card Transaction Search Functionality
full_cases.custom_preconds:
User is logged in and on Credit Cards page
Transaction data is available
Search functionality is enabled
full_cases.custom_expected:
Search input field is present and functional

full_cases.title: Verify Credit Card Statement Upload Area
full_cases.custom_preconds:
User is logged in and on Credit Cards page
Upload functionality is available
User has upload permissions
full_cases.custom_expected:
Upload area is clearly visible and accessible
Upload interface is functional and intuitive

File type guidance is provided

full_cases.title: Test Credit Card Statement File Upload Validation
full_cases.custom_preconds:
User is logged in and on Credit Cards page
Upload functionality is available
Test files are available for upload
User has upload permissions
full_cases.custom_expected:
File upload process completes successfully
Valid files are accepted and processed
System provides clear feedback on upload status
Uploaded statement is processed and appears in transactions
File processing extracts data correctly
Upload validation works as expected

full_cases.custom_preconds:

Transaction data is available
Reconciliation functionality is enabled
full_cases.custom_expected:
Reconciliation status indicators are present and visible

full_cases.custom_preconds:

full_cases.title: Test Credit Card Transaction Action Buttons
full_cases.custom_preconds:

full_cases.custom_expected:

full_cases.title: Test Complete Credit Cards Workflow
full_cases.custom_preconds:
User is logged in with full credit cards permissions
All credit cards functionality is available
Test data and files are prepared
Complete workflow testing is enabled
full_cases.custom_expected:
Complete credit cards workflow functions correctly
All major features work as expected
Data integrity is maintained throughout
User experience is smooth and intuitive
System performance is acceptable
Error conditions are handled appropriately
Workflow completion is successful

full_cases.title: Test Credit Cards Empty State Handling
full_cases.custom_preconds:
User is logged in and on Credit Cards page
Empty state conditions are present
Empty state handling is implemented
full_cases.custom_expected:
Empty states are handled gracefully
Empty state messaging is clear and helpful
No results scenarios are handled appropriately
Empty state UI is functional and intuitive
User guidance is provided in empty states

full_cases.title: Test Credit Cards Page Responsiveness
full_cases.custom_preconds:
User is logged in and on Credit Cards page
Performance testing is enabled
Responsiveness monitoring is available
full_cases.custom_expected:
Page loads within acceptable time limits
All operations complete within 30 seconds
Page responsiveness is smooth and consistent
Performance metrics are within acceptable ranges
User experience is not impacted by performance issues

full_cases.custom_expected:

full_cases.title: Handle Duplicate Credit Card Uploads
full_cases.custom_preconds:
User is logged in and on Credit Cards page
Upload functionality is available
Test file is available for duplicate testing
full_cases.custom_expected:
System detects duplicate file uploads
Appropriate warning or prevention message is displayed
Original file data remains unchanged
User is informed about duplicate attempt
System maintains data integrity

full_cases.title: Process Uploaded Credit Card Statements
full_cases.custom_preconds:
User is logged in and on Credit Cards page
Upload functionality is available
Valid statement file is available
Statement processing is enabled
full_cases.custom_expected:
Statement upload completes successfully
Processing indicators are visible during processing
Statement data is extracted correctly
Transaction data appears in the system
Data accuracy and completeness are maintained
Processing completes within reasonable time

full_cases.title: Handle Unmatched Credit Card Transactions
full_cases.custom_preconds:
User is logged in and on Credit Cards page
Transaction data is available
Unmatched transactions exist
Reconciliation functionality is enabled
full_cases.custom_expected:
Unmatched transaction indicators are present and visible
Unmatched transactions are clearly identified
Status information is accurate and up-to-date
Reconciliation options are available for unmatched items
Clear guidance is provided for handling unmatched transactions

full_cases.custom_preconds:
